title: you’re the music in me.mp3
body:
↴

♡  written for the @yoonkookbigbang​ ♡

  • rating: teen and up audiences ;
  • genre: fluff, humour ;
  • word count: 6897 ;
  • warnings: light swearing, mention of drinking ;

↴

“Jeongguk-ah, look at me in the eyes.” Yoongi dimly teases. “Have you ever seen a sound technician smile?”
He replies with a small laughter. It actually catches Yoongi off guard, but it’s not a bad sound, he finds himself thinking, a little confused. It’s actually kind of nice.
“Sorry,” Jeongguk adds, still looking amused. “But why do you hate your job so much?”

read it on ao3 !

↴

♡  go check @tearhobi‘s work for this fic on here !  ♡

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonkook
blog.title: From afar, I steal glances; if we touch hands, will I lose you?
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: quiet
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JsDACc

by lostmyg (IKnowWhat_YouDid)

his eyes are glazed over, bloodshot as if he were crying for a long time. his lips are bitten and swollen; a deep red as if painted with blood.

he wants them to ask if he is okay, he wants them to take him in their arms and protect him from the world. he wants it all to be peaceful, to be calm, to be quiet. (but it won’t happen, he’s min yoongi; the strong one)

Words: 1270, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Min Yoongi | Suga, Park Jimin (BTS), Jeon Jungkook, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Kim Taehyung | V, Kim Seokjin | Jin, Kim Namjoon | RM
  • Relationships: Min Yoongi | Suga/Park Jimin, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Min Yoongi | Suga, Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Seokjin | Jin/Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Taehyung | V/Min Yoongi | Suga, Min Yoongi | Suga/Everyone, Jeon Jungkook/Jung Hoseok/Kim Namjoon/Kim Seokjin/Kim Taehyung/Min Yoongi/Park Jimin, Kim Namjoon | RM/Min Yoongi | Suga, Jeon Jungkook/Kim Taehyung | V, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Park Jimin, Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin
  • Additional Tags: Depression, Self-Harm, Self-Hatred, Depressed Min Yoongi | Suga, Min Yoongi | Suga Is Bad at Feelings, Bottom Min Yoongi | Suga, Min Yoongi | Suga-centric, Sad Min Yoongi | Suga, Sub Min Yoongi | Suga, Jeon Jungkook is Whipped, Top Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Protective Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Protective Kim Seokjin | Jin, Protective Kim Namjoon | RM, Protective Park Jimin, Protective Kim Taehyung | V, Protective Jeon Jungkook, Crying, Cute Min Yoongi | Suga, smol yoongi, Kim Taehyung | V Is a Good Friend, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope Is a Good Friend, Jeon Jungkook Is a Good Friend, Park Jimin Is a Good Friend, Kim Namjoon | RM & Min Yoongi | Suga Are Best Friends, Kim Namjoon | RM is a Sweetheart, Kim Seokjin | Jin Is a Good Hyung, Angel Kim Seokjin | Jin

title: Lilies burn white
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LhjnEm

by xheartsigh (ChocolatMuffin)

There was once a prophecy forecasting the doom of the kingdom, a tragedy that begins to unfold on the 21th birthday of the Fae Kingdom’s crown prince. He was said to fall in love with a man who bears a scar on his cheek and fire in his eyes. The king had done everything to make sure it wouldn’t happen but nobody could defy fate.

(In which Jungkook and Yoongi were destined to be together despite all circumstances.)

Words: 21522, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Jeon Jungkook, Min Yoongi | Suga

There was once a prophecy forecasting the doom of the kingdom, a tragedy that begins to unfold on the 21th birthday of the Fae Kingdom’s crown prince. He was said to fall in love with a man who bears a scar on his cheek and fire in his eyes. The king had done everything to make sure it wouldn’t happen but nobody could defy fate.

(In which Jungkook and Yoongi were destined to be together despite all circumstances.)

blog.name: morethanpeachykeen
blog.title: a hoe
blog.description: Just here to share some of my subpar creativity.

title: BTS Reaction
body:
You say, “I love you”

SEOKJIN

He’d immediately start laughing and turn red. Of course, he’d hug you and return your feelings a hundred times after. Knowing Seokjin, he’d probably shower you in compliments and kiss you all over your face too, just in case his words weren’t enough. 

“I love you, I love you, I love you!”

YOONGI

Yoongi’s gummy smile would be in full effect. He’d smile and his eyes would look like they were sparkling. This was so important to him, to hear you, the love of his life, reciprocate his feelings. He’d just cuddle you extra hard that day and there’d be a fuck ton of skinship because he was that soft. 

HOSEOK

I see him smiling (every member will just a redundant heads up) and then pulling you close to him and start dancing with you. Like he would have you move out and then spin into his arms and start swaying with you. While this is happening he’d tell you everything he loves about you (which is everything) THIS MAKES ME SOFT

NAMJOON

For Namjoon, I can see him writing a whole song for you. He knew how to show his feelings but he felt that a song would convey them more. Besides, he may be good with his hands (wink wink) but his words were never the best. So a song was perfect. 

“Baby, listen to this bop I made!”

JIMIN

Hearing the words come out of your mouth did something to him, made him feel things. It was as if his feelings went into overdrive. Jimin was absolutely dumbfounded so all he did was smile and say it back. 

“… Don’t misinterpret my silence, my love for you is overwhelming.”

TAEHYUNG

Taehyung would smile so wide and he might start tearing up. Like Jimin, his feelings overtook him and he couldn’t think straight. He just hoped that the way he was looking at you was showing all his feelings. 

JUNGKOOK

At first, he didn’t know if he heard you correctly. He would ask you what you said. You repeat. He asks if you’re serious. Then he would start rambling like a bitch. 

“You know I’m an idol, right? You’re basically signing a death contract. And by saying you love me, you have to love every part of me. I sleep pretty irradic-”

“Jungkook, shut up and kiss me already!”

blog.name: seleneangel-likeaflower
blog.title: Like A Flower
blog.description: No matter how crazy I run, I remain on the same place

summary: I can finally breathe again and it’s because of you, it’s because of this song. I’ll be forever grateful for the day I found out...
caption:
I can finally breathe again and it’s because of you, it’s because of this song. I’ll be forever grateful for the day I found out your voice had the power to soothe my worries.
Thank you Yoongi.
